member.name: HatchBrush.GetBackgroundColor
member.summary: The HatchBrush.GetBackgroundColor method gets the background color of this hatch brush.
member.param: Pointer to a Color object that receives the background color. The background color defines the color over which the hatch lines are drawn.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: HatchBrush.GetForegroundColor
member.summary: The HatchBrush.GetForegroundColor method gets the foreground color of this hatch brush.
member.param: Pointer to a Color object that receives the foreground color. The foreground color defines the color of the hatch lines.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: HatchBrush.GetHatchStyle
member.summary: The HatchBrush.GetHatchStyle method gets the hatch style of this hatch brush.
member.returns: This method returns the hatch style, which is one of the elements of the enumeration.

member.name: HatchBrush.HatchBrush
member.param: The HatchBrush object to copy into this object.

member.name: HatchBrush.HatchBrush
member.summary: Creates a HatchBrush.HatchBrush object based on a hatch style, a foreground color, and a background color.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the pattern of hatch lines that will be used.
Reference to a color to use for the hatch lines.
Optional. Reference to a color to use for the background. The default value is Color()(a Color object created by the default Color constructor).
